DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate effect BHQ880 patient previously untreated multiple myeloma renal insufficiency consider candidate bisphosphonate therapy . The primary objective study evaluate effect BHQ880 combination bortezomib dexamethasone , compare placebo administer combination time first Skeletal Related Event ( SRE ) study .

Recovered effect prior surgery radiotherapy 1 . Prior IV bisphosphonate therapy time oral bisphosphonate therapy within 4 month study entry 2 . Paget 's disease bone uncorrected hyperparathyroidism 3 . Impaired cardiac function 4 . Known HIV , know active hepatitis B , know suspect hepatitis C infection 5 .
